lead_paragraph: Tom Osborne is returning to Nebraska to temporarily run the Cornhuskers’ athletic department and possibly determine the fate of Bill Callahan, the football coach. The 70-year-old Osborne’s return came a day after Steve Pederson was fired as athletic director. Callahan’s team is a disappointing 4-3.
